Ririka

Introduction

Kishida Ririka is a Japanese singer under FC ENM. As a trainee, she participated in survival programs such as "Nizi Project" and "Girls Planet 999." She was also supposed to debut on the Korean-Japanese girl group "Orange Latte," but the plans fell through midway. On April 4, 2022, Ririka debuted as a member of the girl group ILY:1 with the stage name Riri.

In January 2020, she participated in the first season of the Nizi Project. However, she was eliminated following the first round of eliminations.

Sometime in early 2020, Ririka was revealed as a member of JSL Japan's upcoming Japanese-Korean girl group Orange Latte. However, by early 2021, all of Orange Latte's SNS accounts were deleted and several members have departed from the agency, including Ririka. Ririka was later confirmed to have joined the South Korean agency, FC ENM.

On July 7, 2021, Ririka was confirmed as a contestant on Mnet's newest reality show, Girls Planet 999. Unfortunately, on the 11th episode aired on October 15, Ririka was revealed to have been eliminated following the third round of eliminations.
